alert.note: Alert for Bay; Franklin; Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 10 at 7:34AM EST until March 10 at 8:15AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southeastern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southwestern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... North central Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 815 AM EST/715 AM CST/. * At 734 AM EST/634 AM CST/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mexico Beach, or 14 miles northwest of Port St. Joe, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mexico Beach, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Orange, Wewahitchka, Honeyville, Allanton, Chipola Cutoff, Red Hill, Overstreet, Kern, Davis Beach, Wilma, Lewis, Sumatra, Willis Landing, Wetappo, Beacon Hill, Dalkeith and Saint Joe Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
